title: Average annual consumer spending , by type U.S. 2018
summary: Being one of the largest offshoring destinations for different IT companies across the world , the business process management market in U.S. is of considerable importance .
The information technology/business process management ( consumer ) sector had contributed a Spending of around 20091 billion to the U.S. of the country in Housing .
BPM is more like a discipline than a process that incorporates methods to improve , analyze automate and improve business processes .
gold: This statistic shows the average annual expenditures of consumer units in the United States in 2018 , by type.
In 2018 , the average U.S. consumer unit spent about 7,923 U.S. dollars on food.
The total average U.S. consumer spending amounted to 61,224 U.S. dollars .
